_xResult.title: Batwing Love Me Sweater
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made textured sweater with dolman-sleeve
_xResult.longdesc:
This made to measure sweater is a fun layering piece for any season, but especially on cold crisp days. The fabric on this fuzzy sweater is a faux-wool with a curly texture, but it's washable acrylic. The bright fuchsia color really pops when paired against dark leggings or jeans. It comes up to a "split" just at the navel, so you can wear it with or without a layer underneath. Plus, we could die for the extra long sleeves—such drama!

For custom made requests regarding sizing, let Teyxo know your desired measurements using the button below.
